about_the_game:
ABOUT GAME
Have you have ever been in this situation?
Suddenly, you feel like something big and get stomachache. Fortunately, you find a public toilet in the distance!
Run and run! 'WHERE IS TOILET!?' is a game about the man who in this problematic situation.
On the journey to the Toilet, ordinary people, such as children playing with water, villagers jogging, and idol enthusiasts, can become villains.
Get to the toilet for save your face!


GAME FEATURES
Where is Toilet!? is a running-platformer game.
it's a game when you running to the toilet avoiding obstacles.


VARIOUS ENEMIES
On the journey to the Toilet, there are variety villains.
the maps are located randomly.
Beat out them and reach to the Toilet.


COMBO SYSTEM
Beat out the villains through stomp, you get a combo bonus.
Combo bonus can give you faster and invincible.
Get more combo and get to the Toilet faster!


ENJOY WITH LOCAL-MULTIPLAYER
You can enjoy the 'WHERE IS TOILET!?' through two player with one keyboard,
or one keyboard and one gamepad. Who will get a glorious honor go into the Toilet.

name: WHERE IS A TOILET!? Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10 x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: WHERE IS TOILET!? is a simple running-platformer game using only move and jump key.Player is reach to the Goal avoiding obstacles. Player also can get a combo bonus through stomping villains.Two or more combo bonus get player faster and invincible, it is a important key to the victory.
